pages.privacy-policy: CasinoPark Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Personal Information CasinoPark HOME Events Games Contact Privacy Policy for CasinoPark At CasinoPark, we prioritize the protection of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle your data, including its collection, usage, disclosure, and protection. By using our website, you agree to the practices described in this policy. Data Collection We may gather various types of personal data when you engage with our website, such as: your name, email address, birthdate, home address, phone number, payment information, and gaming preferences. This information might be collected through activities like account registration, financial transactions, customer service interactions, and other related activities. Data Utilization The information we collect serves several purposes, including: verifying accounts, processing transactions, delivering customer support, conducting marketing and promotional activities, preventing fraud and illegal activities, and improving our services. We may also use data for analytical purposes to understand user behaviors and preferences better. Data Sharing We may share your personal data with third-party service providers who assist us in running our operations and delivering services to you. These third parties are contractually obligated to protect your information and ensure its confidentiality. Additionally, we may disclose data to comply with legal obligations or to protect our rights and interests. Data Security CasinoPark employs advanced security measures to safeguard your personal information from unauthorized access, use, alteration, or destruction. Despite our efforts, no method of data transmission or storage can be guaranteed to be completely secure, and we cannot ensure absolute protection. Your Rights You have specific rights concerning your personal data, including the right to access, correct, delete, restrict processing, and object to processing. To exercise these rights, please reach out to our customer support team. Policy Updates We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page, and the revised policy will take effect as soon as it is posted. The CasinoPark website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. pages.terms-conditions: CasinoPark Terms and Conditions - Rules & Regulations CasinoPark HOME Events Games Contact Terms and Conditions for CasinoPark Welcome to CasinoPark. By using our website, you agree to adhere to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our site. By creating an account, you confirm that you comply with these age restrictions. Account Creation To access specific features of CasinoPark, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for keeping your account details secure. CasinoPark is not liable for any unauthorized access or activities conducted through your account. Any attempts to manipulate our systems, exploit any vulnerabilities, or engage in fraudulent behavior are strictly forbidden and may lead to account suspension and legal consequences. Unauthorized use of this intellectual property is prohibited. Limitation of Liability To the maximum extent allowed by law, CasinoPark disclaims all responsibility for any damages or losses that may arise from using or being unable to use our website or services. This includes, but is not limited to, direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and protect CasinoPark, along with its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents, from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, or expenses resulting from your use of our website or any breach of these Terms and Conditions.
